item.description:
It's back and we had such a blast the last time, why not go again!?!?

Put on your best holiday sparkle and glam and get ready for the return of your favorite 21+ party! –
AND if you’re brave enough, wear your tackiest ugly sweater for the first ever “Super-Ugly Sweater Contest”. Prizes will be awarded throughout the night.

Be there with 1000+ of your closest friends for liquid delights (featuring $2 Mistletoe Moonshine Shots), 150+ exhibits including the NEW exhibit Animation (featuring the Cartoon Network and sponsored by First Niagara) and:

•DJ John Rzaza spinning your favorite holiday dance hits
•The return of the Glamour Girls •Beat City Beauties strut their stuff
•The Alter-ego Photo Booth captures the perfect pose
•Glitter Tattoos - 'nough said
•Live Snow Science •And much more entertainment and surprises to be announced soon!

Discounted tickets available online NOW!
•$10 if purchased by December 1  (http://www.ctsciencecenter.org/things-to-do/liquid-lounge.aspx -- the last time there was a small fee for buying online, bringing the total to $13 but if multiple people buy under one account, we can save a little dough :)
•$15 at the door
•$10 for Science Center Members

Liquid lounge is from 6-10pm. There is a cafe at the entrance for those of you who are coming right from work and need food. There is parking in the area... check the above website to get info for the hartford area (bc i know jack about hartford parking).
I am more than happy to carpool from the waterbury area. I will be leaving early obviously because it's a Friday night during rush hour.

Any ideas for where to go afterward???
item.name: Liquid Lounge: Merry Making 12/2/11
